alert.note: Alert for Lane; Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 8:16PM CDT until May 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ness County in west central Kansas... Northeastern Lane County in west central Kansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 816 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Utica, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Utica around 830 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Arnold. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
